typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employeesdata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Department
Employeesdata, Department exists(Employeesdata@deptid == Depname,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['harishoutout.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> harishoutout
